member.name: ID3D12Device6.SetBackgroundProcessingMode
member.summary: Sets the mode for driver background processing optimizations.
member.param: The level of dynamic optimization to apply to GPU work that's subsequently submitted.
The action to take with the results of earlier workload instrumentation.
An optional handle to signal when the function is complete. For example, if MeasurementsAction is set to , then hEventToSignalUponCompletion is signaled when all resulting compilations have finished.
An optional pointer to a Boolean value. The function sets the value to true to indicate that you should continue profiling, otherwise, false.
